comment.author: 84904494@N00
comment._content: I hear ya Bro!  When I found that Museums had opened their collections online, I about peed my pants!  I have lots of them as friends now, and love to dig as I can to see "Stuff"  I too love to look at the old pics countered with where we are now. Do you have more of those sites that I can go see?  I have a found a few here on Flicker, but would love to see more!  Thanks!  E-

comment.author: 22842940@N04
comment._content: Being a Fine Artist;  I like this very much.  And actually some people can not travel as they would like to.  So when others go to Museums and take photos to post on line,  it is wonderful for us to se.

comment.author: 51187360@N06
comment._content: Creo que el trabajo de Jimy Wales merece un premio nobel; fabuloso¡ Gracias por facilitar la labor de estudio para mis hijos con sus consultas escolares, y también por permitir que sea posible consultar cualquier tema que a uno se le pueda ocurrir desde la flor de jamaica hasta la conformación del átomo o el nombre de los actores de "Narnia". Gracias y felicitaciones¡¡¡.
